backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, product CRUD, and storage/Stripe mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing files, components, and tests evidencing rollback feature to version v59.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries describing purpose of each major frontend React file.
frontend/deploy/nginx/site.conf: Example Nginx config for serving the SPA with caching, security headers, and SPA fallback routing.
Systemd unit file to run Nginx as a service for serving the frontend.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide detailing environment setup, checks, and steps for promoting frontend builds to production.
frontend/docker-compose.yml: Docker Compose file building and running the frontend with env vars and health checks.
frontend/Dockerfile: Multi‑stage Docker build for the frontend using Node and Nginx with runtime env injection.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: SPA entry HTML with runtime env shim and bootstrapping of the React app.
frontend/LINUX_HOSTING.md: Linux hosting guide covering Docker, Docker Compose, and direct Nginx deployment of the frontend.
frontend/nginx/default.conf: Nginx config for serving a Vite React SPA with caching rules, security headers, and SPA fallback routing.
frontend/offline-bundle/assets/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to keep the assets directory in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/css/styles.css: Main stylesheet defining layout, typography, color variables, responsive header, hero section, and UI components.
frontend/offline-bundle/fonts/.gitkeep: Empty placeholder file to retain the fonts directory in version control.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/hero-illu: SVG illustration depicting a stylized agricultural landscape with hills, plants, and a tractor.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/journal-p: SVG placeholder image representing a journal cover with lines and decorative elements.
frontend/offline-bundle/images/logo.svg: SVG logo featuring a circular emblem with leaf-like shapes and accent elements.
frontend/offline-bundle/index.html: Main HTML file for the offline site containing header navigation, hero section, about content, and structured page layout.
frontend/offline-bundle/js/app.js: JavaScript for mobile menu toggling, smooth scrolling, basic form handling, and section-based navigation highlighting.
frontend/offline-bundle/README.md: Explains how to use the offline bundle by opening index.html directly and outlines folder structure.
frontend/project/admin.html: Admin panel UI with user search, user table, and detailed user profile display sections.
frontend/project/assets/.gitkeep: Placeholder file to retain the assets directory in version control.
frontend/project/css/main.css: Global styles for layout, typography, forms, buttons, dashboards, and responsive UI components.
frontend/project/dashboard.html: User dashboard page displaying profile information with editing and photo upload options.
frontend/project/index.html: Login and registration page with forms for authentication, account creation, and password recovery.
frontend/project/js/admin.js: Admin module that handles admin authentication, user loading, searching, detail viewing, and admin actions.
frontend/project/js/auth.js: Authentication module managing login, registration, password reset, sessions, and access control.
frontend/project/js/dashboard.js: Initializes and manages the user dashboard, handling profile display, editing, photo upload, and various section loads.
frontend/project/js/db.js: Implements a localStorage-backed mock database with seed data for users, payments, submissions, and session handling.
frontend/project/js/main.js: Determines the active page, initializes index page logic, and handles login, registration, and password flows.
frontend/project/README.md: Documentation for an offline journal management mini-app detailing authentication, user dashboard features, and admin tools.
frontend/project/receipts/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the receipts directory is committed.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the React router, query client, providers, and route definitions for all major app pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Displays an access denied alert informing users they lack permissions.
frontend/src/components/ArticleSubmissio: Renders the user's article subscription plan details with loading, error, and active plan states.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: Shows a live countdown timer to the 25th of the month deadline.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with branding, social links, navigation links, and utility widgets.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation, authentication menu, mobile menu, and admin options.
frontend/src/components/HomeHeroIllustra: Hero illustration that displays an autoplaying video with fallback to an image and a gradient overlay.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper composing header, notice banner, main outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LoadingScreen.ts: Animated loading screen showing determinate or timed progress with fade-out behavior.
frontend/src/components/NoticeMarqueeBan: Scrolling notice marquee shown when enabled and loaded from banner config.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Product card showing product name, category badge, and external buy button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for collecting and submitting user profile information with validation.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupDialo: Modal form for entering Stripe secret key and allowed countries, submitting config via mutation.
frontend/src/components/VisitorCounter.t: Displays a visitor count stored in localStorage and increments it on page load.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook detecting user's reduced‑motion preference via media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of placeholder and real React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data using an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, themes, typography, and utility animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutContactPage.tsx: Renders an About and Contact page with mission info, founder profiles, and a basic contact form with toast-based validation.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelContent.tsx: Provides admin UI for managing products, including listing, adding, editing, and deleting items via hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Wraps the admin panel with permission checks and displays loading or error states accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/ArticleSubmissionPage: Implements the article submission form with auth checks and eligibility validation, but disables actual submission.
Displays detailed author guidelines, publication policies, and formatting rules with SEO metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/ConsultationPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Shows user dashboard with profile info, subscription status, and article list, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/EditorialBoardPage.ts: Displays editorial board members with photos, roles, and contact details using fetched data and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/pages/ForgotPasswordPage.ts: Shows a disabled password reset page explaining that password-based authentication is unsupported and providing support contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero section and multiple content sections populated from queries or sample data, including news, blogs, magazines, reviews, and products.
frontend/src/pages/JournalsPage.tsx: Shows the current journal issue and an archive by year with options to download journal PDFs.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides login via Internet Identity, with email/password fields disabled and admin check logic determining navigation.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays all news and blog posts in tabbed sections with loading states and formatted metadata.
frontend/src/pages/NoticeBoardPage.tsx: Empty page with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with details and navigation options to retry, contact support, or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Handles Stripe payment success flow by validating session status, creating subscriptions, showing loading states, and displaying errors.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays product lists for books and agricultural items with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/SignupPage.tsx: Shows a disabled signup form and informs users that email/password registration is unavailable, directing them to Internet Identity instead.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionPage.tsx: Lists subscription plans, checks Stripe setup, and creates checkout sessions for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/TermsAndConditionsPag: Fetches and displays the platform’s terms and conditions with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Defines browser-safe TypeScript declarations for process.env to avoid build errors.
frontend/src/utils/consultationValidatio: Empty placeholder file intended for consultation-related validation logic.
frontend/src/utils/consultExpertMailto.t: Empty placeholder utility file for generating expert consultation mailto links.
frontend/src/utils/consultWhatsAppLink.t: Empty placeholder utility file for creating WhatsApp consultation links.
frontend/src/utils/homePageSamples.ts: Provides placeholder types and sample data for news, blog posts, and other homepage content.
frontend/src/utils/optimizeImage.ts: Implements client-side image resizing/compression and a fallback mechanism if optimization fails or yields larger output.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Utility functions to set document title and meta description for SEO.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requests for rolling back the app to version v59.
